mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, pwd, email, nickname, birth_date, gender, tel, signdate, profile_org, profile_real, kakao, token) VALUES (#{id}, md5(#{pwd}), #{email}, #{nickname}, #{birth_date}, #{gender}, #{tel}, NOW(), #{profile_org}, #{profile_real}, #{kakao}, #{token})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET pwd=md5(#{pwd}), email=#{email}, tel=#{tel} WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT no, id, nickname FROM user WHERE id=#{id} and pwd=md5(#{pwd})
SELECT * FROM user WHERE nickname=#{nickname} and email=#{email}
SELECT * FROM user WHERE id=#{id} and email=#{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET pwd=md5(#{pwd}) WHERE id=#{id} AND email=#{email}
